title: Cyber Threat Alliance
extract: WHAT IS THE CYBER THREAT ALLIANCE? The CTA is a not-for-profit organization that is working to improve the cybersecurity of our global digital ecosystem by enabling near real-time, high-quality cyber threat information sharing among companies and organizations in the cybersecurity field.
extract_html: WHAT IS THE CYBER THREAT ALLIANCE? The CTA is a not-for-profit organization that is working to improve the cybersecurity of our global digital ecosystem by enabling near real-time, high-quality cyber threat information sharing among companies and organizations in the cybersecurity field.
